Hong Kong is dying. . .

Please help to sign up the Petition to urge US Government recognizing Hong Kong Police Force as a Terrorist Organization

Regarding the violent actions of Hong Kong Police Force relating to the peaceful assembly and protest since June up to present, and especially the terrorist attacks in Yuen Long by some triad gangsters in white tee shirt on July 21st and the sexual assaults to a young girl being arrested on August 4th, please to sign up this petition.
